revision.text:
{{Talk header}} {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=18:16, 2 August 2006 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=66782908
|action2=PR |action2date=16:38, 21 August 2006 |action2link=Wikipedia:Peer review/John W. Johnston/archive1 |action2result=reviewed |action2oldid=69113039
|action3=FAC |action3date=01:12, 19 October 2006 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/John W. Johnston |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=82148610
|currentstatus=FA |maindate=October 12, 2013 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=no|class=FA|politician-priority=Low|old-peer-review=yes|politician-work-group=yes|listas=Johnston, John W.}} {{WikiProject Politics|class=FA|importance=low}} {{WikiProject U.S. Congress|class=FA|importance=low|subject=Person}} {{WikiProject Virginia|class=FA|importance=high}} }}
==Good article== Very nice article. Very thorough, especially in describing the key opoints of his more career defining involvements. Very well referenced and good use of inline references. Short, but informative. Great job to all the editors!--[[User:Esprit15d|Esprit15d]] 18:19, 2 August 2006 (UTC) :Must disagree. I think it's too long for the notability of the subject, and could usefully be shortened anyway on grounds of style. I just got reverted by Bencherlite for abbreviating the lede. He said it was in proportion to the overall length - well over 10%, in fact. And very odd that it doesn't mention that he was a cousin of Joe Johnston. [[User:Valetude|Valetude]] ([[User talk:Valetude|talk]]) 21:09, 13 October 2013 (UTC)
== Eh? ==
Something tells me he was not born on the 36th of January. Am I correct? [[User:Bobamnertiopsis|<font color="660000" face="Andalus">'''Bob'''</font><font color="00FFCC">Amnertiopsis</font>]][[Special:Contributions/Bobamnertiopsis|∴]]<sub><font color="FF9999" face="Tunga">[[User talk:Bobamnertiopsis|ChatMe!]]</font></sub> 05:38, 2 October 2009 (UTC)
:Sorry, read that wrong. Something tells me that his term ''as senator'' didn't begin on Jan. 36th. When was it? [[User:Bobamnertiopsis|<font color="660000" face="Andalus">'''Bob'''</font><font color="00FFCC">Amnertiopsis</font>]][[Special:Contributions/Bobamnertiopsis|∴]]<sub><font color="FF9999" face="Tunga">[[User talk:Bobamnertiopsis|ChatMe!]]</font></sub> 02:05, 3 October 2009 (UTC)
== Warfield ==
Any relation to the Warfields from whom Wallis Warfield Simpson was descended? [[User:Valetude|Valetude]] ([[User talk:Valetude|talk]]) 10:30, 13 October 2013 (UTC)
== Now a FA in Chinese Wikipedia == I have translated this article to [[Chinese Wikipedia]] [[:zh:约翰·W·约翰斯顿|here]] and promoted to FA status, and I want to thank [[User:Plange]] for his effort to write this amazing article. --[[User:Jarodalien|Jarodalien]] ([[User talk:Jarodalien|talk]]) 08:41, 11 January 2016 (UTC) :: That's so great! Thank you! And, for the record, I'm a 'she' :) [[User:Plange|plange]] ([[User talk:Plange|talk]]) 00:01, 19 March 2016 (UTC)
